text: Speak in a fake accent until your next turn.
Let the group choose an embarrassing song and sing 30 seconds of it.
Do your best impression of another player for one full minute.
Send a funny selfie to the last person you texted and show the chat.
Let another player rearrange your hair however they want.
Talk about your day as if you were a dramatic movie narrator.
Do 10 push-ups or your best attempt at them.
Act out a scene from a movie until someone guesses which one.
Let the person on your right change your phone wallpaper.
For the next round, you can only communicate with facial expressions and gestures.
Read the last message you sent out loud in your most serious voice.
Allow another player to draw a small doodle on your hand or arm.
Speak only in questions until your next turn.
Do a runway walk across the room as if you were on a fashion show.
Try to make everyone in the group laugh in 60 seconds.
Let another player write a short status message and you have to read it out loud as if posting it.
Balance an object on your head and walk three steps without dropping it.
Do your best imitation of a famous celebrity until someone guesses who it is.
Talk about your favorite food as if you were in a serious job interview.
Let someone else in the group go through your phone photos and pick one for you to describe in detail.
Try to lick your elbow and don’t explain yourself.
Pretend you are a robot that keeps glitching for one minute.
Swap seats with the person farthest away from you and compliment them on something.
Do a dramatic slow-motion reaction to everything that happens until your next turn.
Allow the player on your left to send one emoji to any contact on your phone.
Describe your last meal as if it were a five-star restaurant review.
Let another player choose a word you are not allowed to say for two rounds. Every time you say it, you have to do a silly dance.
Do your best impression of someone trying to sneak into their own house at 3 a.m.
Give a 30-second motivational speech about something completely random chosen by the group.
Let someone rearrange three items in the room and you have to guess what changed.
Talk for one minute as if you were a YouTuber doing an overexcited product review.
Put your socks on your hands and leave them there for the next two rounds.
Invent a new handshake with the person next to you and demonstrate it to the group.
Try to juggle three random small objects for 30 seconds.
Stand in the middle of the room and strike three different “album cover” poses.
Let another player send a voice note from your phone saying only nice things.
Narrate everything the person on your right does for the next minute like a sports commentator.
Do your best impression of a teacher or boss you’ve had (without naming them).
Close your eyes and let someone hand you an object. You have to guess what it is only by touch.
Act as if you were stuck in slow internet lag for 45 seconds.
Try to whistle a song chosen by the group until someone recognizes it.
Let the person across from you write one word on your forehead (or a sticky note) and keep it there for three rounds.
Do an overly dramatic reading of a random text message from your phone.
Pretend you are giving a serious TED talk about something completely useless.
Stand like a statue while everyone tries to make you laugh for 30 seconds.
Tell a sincere compliment to every person in the room.
Pretend that the floor is lava for the next minute and act accordingly.
Let someone else control your facial expression with their hands while you try to tell a short story.
Choose a random object in the room and try to sell it to the group like an infomercial host.
Create a short jingle about this game and perform it for the group.
